name: Horsea
flavorText:
Known to shoot
down flying bugs
with precision blasts of ink
from the surface
of the water.

previous.name: Kangaskhan
previous.flavorText:
The infant rarely
ventures out of
its mother's protective pouch
until it is 3
years old.

next.name: Seadra
next.flavorText:
Capable of swim­
ming backwards by
rapidly flapping its wing-like
pectoral fins and
stout tail.

pokemon.name: Kingdra
pokemon.flavorText:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.
